GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14.241 to before v4.14.305
GSD.description:
netrom: Fix use-after-free of a listening socket.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.305 by commit e666990abb2e42dd4ba979b4706280a3664cfae7, it was introduced in version v4.14.241 by commit 48866fd5c361ea417ed24b43fc2a7dc2f5b060ef. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netrom: Fix use-after-free of a listening socket.
